```{r}
Mtable = read.csv("D:/Jazz_visual/csv/Musician_table.csv", row.names = 1)[c(-5,-72,-107,-182,-205,-219,-224),]
write.csv(Mtable, 'D:/jazz_visual/csv/Mtable229.csv', na = '')
```

```{r}
recordLabel = as.data.frame(Mtable$recordLabel)
colnames(recordLabel) = 'recordLabel'
rownames(recordLabel) = rownames(Mtable)
```

# Genre
```{r}
recordLabel_split = token_split(recordLabel, g=1)
```

```{r}
recordLabel_ohe = oh_encoding(recordLabel, tok = recordLabel_split$token_list1)
```

```{r}
recordLabel_matrix = recordLabel_ohe$token_matrix

for(i in 1:nrow(recordLabel_matrix)){
  sum_mu = sum(recordLabel_matrix[i,])
  if(sum_mu>1){
    print(sprintf("Multivalue in %s, value: %s", i, sum_mu))
  }
}
```
